The reality is that if a principal got a call from the Dept asking how they were getting on, they would most likely faint with shock.  We  don‚Äôt have a proactive & caring Education Dept / Minister.  It seems enough for them to have opened schools.   Simply not good enough.  3/3

A proactive & caring Education Dept / Minister would have assembled a task force of officials spanning expertise in health, education & housing a year ago.   Such a group would proactively engage with every school to provide advice, funding & resources to meet their needs.  2/3
